text: Leopold Wharton (September 1, 1870 - September 27, 1927) was an American film director, producer and writer. He directed 37 films between 1911 and 1922, including the 1915 film The New Adventures of J. Rufus Wallingford, which featured Oliver Hardy. He was the brother of Theodore Wharton, who was also a film director. He was born in Manchester, England, and died in New York City. ==Selected filmography== * The Exploits of Elaine (1914) * The New Adventures of J.
